name: warped-reducers
description: Compile a standard Redux reducer from a brief definition

scripts.prepublishOnly: rollup -f umd --output.exports named --output.name warpedReducers -o index.js index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && sanctuary-test && npm run doctest

author: Aldwin Vlasblom <aldwin.vlasblom@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Avaq)
